comment.body:
所以不能將app內的彈出視窗阻擋?
因為這應該是透過app連上mangaapi.manhuaren.com來運行漫畫的
我也不知道這該算網頁還是app，而www.manhuaren.com則是沒有這個問題
然而網頁的某些阻擋規則依然有效，所以我才認為應該可以成功阻擋

So you can't block pop-up windows in the app?
Because this should be connected to mangaapi.manhuaren.com through the app to run the manga
I don't know if this is a web page or an app, and www.manhuaren.com doesn't have this problem
However, some blocking rules of the page are still in effect, so I think it should be successfully blocked

issue.title: mail.yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://mail.yahoo.com/d/folders/1?guccounter=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fd%2Ffolders%2F1%3Fguccounter%3D1) ### Comment > When AGBE is OFF while all other extensions are on, I can access the site. But if it's ON, something blocks the site with page stating: "The page isn’t redirecting properly. Firefox has detected that the server is redirecting the request for this address in a way that will never complete. This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies." ### [NSFW] Screenshots

@Alex-302
> Not working
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/187864236-72ff0120-e167-40dc-ab45-fae8f8388530.png)

So how did this rule come about?
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com/*/public/getMultiAdsStrategy
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21078#issuecomment-413291113

My adguard ver.android filter record cannot find similar conditions that meet this rule
